verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: placed] [ARG1: a note] [ARG2: in the Western Wall] [ARGM-LOC: in Jerusalem] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] , [ARGM-PRD: becoming the first sitting U.S. president to visit one of Judaism 's holiest sites] .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump] placed a note in the Western Wall in Jerusalem on Monday , [V: becoming] [ARG2: the first sitting U.S. president to visit one of Judaism 's holiest sites] .
